edit.title: Can edit
edit.description: Members can edit, delete, and add the file to their Space.

detailsPanel.title: Details Panel
detailsPanel.message: Select a file or folder to see a detailed breakdown.

head.name: Name
head.tooltip: The first icon is blue if the file is in local storage. The second is green if the file is in space storage. The last icon shows the amount of users the file has been shared with.

error.message: Failed to fetch files, please try refreshing.

openError.message: Failed to open file, please try again.

storageLimitReached.description: This file is not backed up, upgrade to Space Pro to back up this file.

empty.title: Hmm, you don't have any files yet
empty.message: Add your first file by dragging it here or use the <0/> icon top left

message.members: Select a bucket to see a detailed breakdown.
message.files: Select a file or folder to see a detailed breakdown.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password?
forgotPassword.description: Choose one of your back up sign in methods to access your account and reset your password. Make sure the option you choose is already added to your Space account.

errors.torus: There was an error with torus integration
errors.noData: There is no data from torus
errors.signin: Sorry, there was an error when trying to recover your account.

createPassword.description: Please create a new password for your Space account.

errorModal.handleInvitationFailed: Failed to accept or reject file sharing invitation

createUsernamePassword.title: Create Username & Password
createUsernamePassword.usernameError: Username is taken, please try another.

sharingModal.linkDescription: Anyone with this link can view the folder.

errors.failedShare: Failed to share file, please try again.

shareLink.title: get Link
shareLink.publicDescription: Anyone with this link can view
shareLink.privateDescription: Only people added to this file can access this link

security.title: Security
security.paperKeyTitle: What is the Account Recovery Phrase?
security.paperKeyInfo: A 12 words mnemonic seed will be created and it's going to be useful to access your account in case you lost your key pair.

seedPhraseModal.title: Seed Phrase
seedPhraseModal.description: Please write down your seed phrase and keep it somewhere safe, this will help you gain access to your account if you forget your password and have no other account recovery method.

warning.title: Add Another Sign In Method
warning.description: We highly recommend adding another sign in method so you are still able to access your account in case you forget your password or lose access to your default sign in method.

security.addNewError: Failed to connect sign in method, please try again.

confirmModal.title: Turn Backup Storage Off
confirmModal.message: Turning off backup storage will delete your backed up files. This is non reversible. If you would like to continue please enter your password.
confirmModal.label: Enter Password

upgrade.title: Upgrade to Space Pro
upgrade.message: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim.

reachingLimit.title: Reaching Backup Limit
reachingLimit.message: The free {{backupLimit}} backup storage is coming close to being at capacity. Upgrade to Space Pro in order to keep backing up your data.

reachedLimit.title: Backup Limit Reached
reachedLimit.message: The free {{backupLimit}} backup storage is at capacity. Upgrade to Space Pro in order to keep backing up your data. Any new files will not be backed up.

backupBenefits.title: Backup Storage Benefits
backupBenefits.message: Store encrypted backups of your files in Space to ensure you don’t lose your files in case you ever lose your device. Storing encrypted backup copies of your files in Space allows you to access your files from other machines, recover files from a lost machine, and also enables users who you share files with to access those files even if you are offline.

form.message: Input your product key below to activate Space Pro.

messageBox.title: Don't have a Product Key yet?
messageBox.description: Visit our store to purchase a product key to activate Space Pro.

planDetails.title: Plan Details
planDetails.balanceLow: Your balance is getting low, add more credits to your account to continue backing up your files.

balanceBox.tooltipMessage: Current balance can cover the next {{timeRemaining}} (estimate) based on your last bill. Exact amount is subject to change based on your Space storage & bandwidth usage.

deleteObject.title: Delete
deleteObject.description: Confirm you want to delete "{{filename}}". This file will be gone forever.
deleteObject.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Are you sure you want to delete this account?

signoutConfirmation.title: Do you know your password?
signoutConfirmation.description: If you don't have a password or written down mnemonic then you might not get back access to your files.

license.title: Register Space Pro
license.description: To register Space Pro, you’ll need a license key
license.description1: Visit our store to make a purchase if you haven’t already.

backup.title: Add backup sign in method
backup.description: Add a backup sign in method to make sure you never lose access to your account.

username.title: Create a Username & Password
username.description: To log in & out easier we recommend creating a username & password.

integrations.title: Add Space to your local drive
integrations.description: Browse files in Space from your computer (not just from the app).

addBackupSignIn.title: Add Backup Sign In Method
addBackupSignIn.description: Choose one of the following options to add to your account as an additional sign in method. This will help ensure you never lose access to your account.
